title: Soulful Vermont Stay with Farm-to-Table Tavern & Pool
description: Experience quintessential New England bliss at Kimpton Taconic Hotel, an IHG Hotel, a picturesque and cosy stay surrounded by Vermont's lush mountainscapes. Discover the diversity of Manchester, where you can immerse yourself in emerald pastures and apple orchards, explore local art and culture, or experience the charm of historic landmarks. At your hotel, the The Copper Grouse beckons with classic American farm-to-table fare, while the glistening pool awaits for ultimate relaxation.
offer_address: 3835 Main Street, Manchester, Vermont 05254, United States

title: Stylish Manchester City Escape in the Trendy Northern Quarter
description: Discover the Northern Quarter’s dazzling spread of bohemian bars, quirky cafés and the tremendous live music scene with a stay at the Crowne Plaza Manchester City Centre, an IHG Hotel. The city’s rich industrial history is celebrated throughout the hotel’s modern design and onsite amenities, making for a memorable stay. Make use of the round-the-clock business centre and gym or fuel your appetite at the Glasshouse Restaurant and Bar, serving bistro-style classics, cocktails and charming high tea.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Manchester City Centre, an IHG Hotel

title: Heritage Manchester City Break Near Bohemian Northern Quarter
description: Discover Victorian-era splendour with signature North England verve at Hotel Indigo Manchester - Victoria Station, an IHG Hotel. Positioned just a minute’s walk from Manchester Victoria train station at the gateway to the city’s bohemian Northern Quarter, this red-bricked historic tea warehouse turned boutique hotel is the perfect place to discover Manchester’s best. If you want to stay in, head to the Mamucium Restaurant & Bar for locally-sourced British fare, classic cocktails and quirky industrial-chic decor.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Manchester - Victoria Station, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 6 Todd St, Manchester M3 1WU, United Kingdom

title: Convenient Manchester Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Whether it's for business or pleasure, experience the epitome of convenience and relaxation at the Crowne Plaza Manchester Airport, an IHG Hotel. A complimentary airport shuttle will do the heavy lifting for you, and the onsite restaurant will help streamline your stay. This plush haven is a stone's throw from Manchester's vibrant city centre. From the historic Castlefield to the bustling Northern Quarter, this hotel is the perfect gateway to discover Manchester's unique charms.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Manchester Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ringway Road, Manchester M90 3NS, United Kingdom

title: Heritage Manchester Urban Escape Minutes from the Northern Quarter
description: Showcasing stunning Victorian architecture, the Kimpton Clocktower Hotel, an IHG Hotel amalgamates heritage and modern design for a stylish stay. Work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre, savour fine dining options at The Refuge Dining Room, or take in a spot of afternoon tea at the Winter Garden. Of course, you can also venture out into the heart of Manchester to hunt for a hearty meal, or explore the bohemian Northern Quarter a short walk away.
location_description: Kimpton Clocktower Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Oxford Street, Manchester M60 7HA, United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Manchester Luxury with Contemporary Japanese & Mexican Restaurant
description: Discover five-star luxury in the heart of Manchester at The Edwardian Manchester, a stunning lifestyle destination that has recently undergone a multi-million-pound redesign, introducing a new standard of service with spacious rooms, stunning suites featuring sweeping city views and meeting spaces for up to 500 people. When you're not exploring this vibrant city, stay close to home and enjoy award-winning contemporary Japanese and Mexican cuisine at Peter Street Kitchen, or opt for Champagne afternoon tea at The Library Champagne Bar. Meanwhile, the state-of-the-art spa, gym and pool offer a range of well-being experiences to enjoy,
offer_address: Free Trade Hall, Peter St, Manchester M2 5GP, United Kingdom
